title: WSB's Weekend Bite: Do This For Portfolio Income Says George Ball
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
This week we're joined by our good friend George Ball, Chairman at Sander Morris Harris. He shares 4 stocks that he would be selling puts against right now to create income for your portfolio. Also, Kim Khan breaks down what to watch for in the week ahead in Catalyst Watch.

Seeking Alpha's Labor Day Sale

Mentioned in this episode:

Options Knowledge Base on Seeking Alpha

Bank of America's Option Calls
